main event: A witness reported seeing a strange bright light moving across the sky in Flint, Michigan, on March 11, 1965.
interesting points: The light was moving rather fast and seemed larger than usual., The light emitted a smaller light that quickly went out., The sighting lasted several minutes as the object moved to the northwest., The report was based on a telephone conversation., There was a letter dated March 22, 1969, regarding the Project Blue Book investigation.
sighted object: a strange bright light in the sky
witness description: a backyard observer with a nephew
